column5: Hi. Going to Eagle Lake Lodge first week of September. Anyone been there? Any tips on Eagle Lake in General?
Big water. Get a hotspots map, for sure. Haven't stayed at Eagle Lake Lodge, but most lodges are terrific. Have fun!Sudsman

Good place to go. Good food, good service, great guides. Recomend one for your first day to learn the pattern and area a little. Lots and lots of water. In the morning it is like the Canadian Navy taking off for war, but once people spread out, it is very nice.
